title: ICE: unreachable, drop-tracking-mir, edition=2021, generators

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
### Code `rustc treereduce.out -Zdrop-tracking-mir=yes --edition=2021` ```Rust #![feature(generators)] fn reborrow_mutable_ref_2(x: &mut i32) { let mut b = || { let mut b = || { let a = &mut *x; yield(); }; yield(); let mut b = || { let a = &mut *x; yield(); }; }; } fn main() { } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.71.0-nightly (1c42cb4ef 2023-04-26) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1c42cb4ef0544fbfaa500216e53382d6b079c001 commit-date: 2023-04-26 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.71.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.2 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
